title: Week 5 Best Bets, Can You Really Gamble On The Browns? (Football 10/06)
description:
Nick Kostos, Will Brinson, Pete Prisco and Jason La Canfora issue their Week 5 picks against the spread. They discuss a winless affair between the Giants and Chargers (4:29), another hapless battle featuring the Jets and Browns (12:04), and the now Super Bowl favorite Steelers, facing the Jaguars (14:57). The conversation and bets continue on Carolina and controversial Cam against the Lions (28:59), the Derek Carr-less Raiders hosting the struggling Ravens (37:45), a 2016 playoff rematch with the Packers visiting the Cowboys (40:10), and Mitch Trubisky making his first NFL start on Monday Night Football as the Bears take on the Vikings (45:29).
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
